title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: I should have called in at my mother's, and I'm thinking ay daein some ay that gear ah got fae Johnny Swan. Rents made me agree we should wait a few days and shoot it together, but he'll be stuck on the pish with Begbie now and probably heading for the cells in Queen Charlotte Street or the High Street with that psychotic wretch in tow. Now I'm wanting tae get shot ay Coke, but without alienating him, as I need tae maintain the open-house policy.

title: Skagboys
author: Welsh, Irvine
snippet: We're gaun right back up tae Swanney's once we open this fucker. We catch our puff in Queen Charlotte  Street, shakin the placky collection boax. Thaire's a fair weight in it.
